Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Walking in Memphis
Reviews.Content: I love this notebook. It is an easy to use, fast, and flexible for the price. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Taylor
Reviews.Content: This is the second Toshiba that I have owned, the first one was also a Satellite and lasted just under 2 years, the new one I got in September lasted only four months before coming to the same death.  Neither computer gets past the Toshiba screen and none of the online assistance is of any help.  I called the IT hotline (because their online help center is confusing and you never get anywhere with it) only to be told that in order for them to check my computer it would cost me a small fee of $149!  Upon further research it appears that my the computer does not recognize the hard drive and needs to be replaced.  Don't trust Toshiba, they are crap, even the quality of the material that makes up the laptop has decreased between my old one and new one.Also, the computer almost never left the house, and the most strenuous activity it was put through was a few hours of Netflix.Don't waste the money!  Trust me I will never waste my money on a Toshiba again.

Reviews.Title: Toshib c75d a7213
Reviews.Author: James C. Pinto
Reviews.Content: Nice computer, fast lots of ram big hard drive.  Windows 8 takes some getting used to but as I use it I am beginning to like it.  It takes awhile since there are no instructions.
